tasks.title: Fix circular imports and deep import chains (#106)
tasks.description: Resolve 3 circular imports and 5 deep import chains in mahabharatha/ module. Use lazy imports or restructure modules to break cycles. IMPORTANT: Run 'ruff format .' and 'ruff check --fix .' before staging any changes.

verification.command: ruff format . && ruff check . && python -c 'import mahabharatha; print("imports ok")'

tasks.title: Add Task prefixes to command files (#105)
tasks.description: Audit command files in mahabharatha/data/commands/ and ensure TaskCreate/TaskUpdate calls have [Bracketed] subject prefixes. IMPORTANT: Run 'ruff format .' before staging.

tasks.title: Fix task state inconsistency (#111)
tasks.description: Ensure tasks cannot transition from 'complete' to 'failed'. Add state machine validation in state.py. IMPORTANT: Run 'ruff format mahabharatha/' and 'ruff check --fix mahabharatha/' before staging.

verification.command: ruff format mahabharatha/state.py && ruff check mahabharatha/state.py && python -m pytest tests/unit/test_state.py -v --timeout=30

tasks.title: Fix level order violations (#110)
tasks.description: Ensure tasks complete in level order. Add level validation in level_coordinator.py. IMPORTANT: Run 'ruff format mahabharatha/' before staging.

verification.command: ruff format mahabharatha/level_coordinator.py && ruff check mahabharatha/level_coordinator.py && python -m pytest tests/unit/test_level_coordinator.py -v --timeout=30

tasks.title: Fix worker pause behavior (#108)
tasks.description: Workers should stop executing when orchestrator pauses on gate failure. Add pause check in worker protocol. IMPORTANT: Run 'ruff format mahabharatha/' before staging.

verification.command: ruff format mahabharatha/worker_protocol.py && ruff check mahabharatha/worker_protocol.py && python -m pytest tests/unit/test_worker_protocol.py -v --timeout=30

tasks.title: Add worker timeout handling (#109)
tasks.description: Add timeout watchdog for Claude API calls in workers to prevent indefinite hangs. IMPORTANT: Run 'ruff format mahabharatha/' before staging.

verification.command: ruff format mahabharatha/launcher.py && ruff check mahabharatha/launcher.py && python -m pytest tests/unit/test_launcher.py -v -k timeout --timeout=30
